page.title: 14HOME LIFE, MARSTON TRUSSELL
page.content: Mrs. Leadley has lived in Marston Trussell for many years. She goes shopping either by bus or car. She does her shopping in{Market {Harborough}as it is the nearest town. There is no shop in the village. She visits Market Harborough twice a week, normally on{Tuesdays}as it is{market {day.}She goes to the supermarket, Boots the Chemist and other shops. She thinks her house was built 300 years ago. She discovered the date,1748,on a brick which was part of the house wall. Her family is made up of herself, her husband and two sons who are married. She said that the{village has changed {very little}while she has lived there.
